author: Ildefonso Ortiz and Brandon Darby, Ildefonso Ortiz and Brandon Darby
title: 'Non-Essential' Mexican Brewery Closures Trigger Massive Beer Runs
description: Thousands of residents in the border state of Nuevo Leon rushed supermarkets and convenience stores to purchase massive quantities of beer after the shutdown of breweries. The panic buying comes as health officials ask the public to stay indoors and keep a sa…
